name: ReSail (JSaginario)
description:
FOR PROPER LAYOUT GO FULLSCREEN BY PRESSING THE LIGHT BLUE BUTTON IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT PLEASE

--ALSO IF IT'S YOUR FIRST TIME PLAYING GO TO THE SETTINGS MENU AND RESET ALL DATA FIRST IN-GAME--

Tutorial in-game.

Music was arranged by me and the audio was edited and recorded by me.

I made or edited all of the sprites and assets in this game, I hope you enjoy it!

Let me know if there are any bugs you find, I'm sure there are several!
